# Chamber of Hidden Character (WondArch)
## Overview
**Chamber of Hidden Character:** The alignment of anyone in this stronghold space is undetectable. Evil characters who do not wish for those around them to know their true alignment often use this feature.

*Caster Level:* 2nd; Prerequisites: [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Undetectable Alignment (Spell)|undetectable alignment]]**; Market Price:* 3,000 gp.

**Source:** Stronghold Builders Guidebook (WotC), pg. 74
